response:
Subacute onset of a right-sided truncal sensory band, unilateral pyramidal signs confined to the right leg (spasticity, weakness, hyperreflexia, extensor plantar), positive Romberg and impaired dorsal column modalities in the legs with preserved cranial nerves and upper limbs indicate a lesion within the thoracic spinal cord affecting the right lateral corticospinal and dorsal column pathways, consistent with a right thoracic hemicord process.

lesion_locations = ["right thoracic spinal cord"]
